salesforce_select_fields: Name, Id, Type, RecordTypeId, BillingStreet, BillingCity, BillingState, BillingPostalCode, BillingCountry, BillingStateCode, Phone, Website, Industry, Description, OwnerId, CreatedDate, LastModifiedDate, Capacity_Building_Needs__c, npe01__LifetimeDonationHistory_Amount__c, npe01__LifetimeDonationHistory_Number__c, npo02__AverageAmount__c, npo02__Best_Gift_Year_Total__c, npo02__LargestAmount__c, npo02__SmallestAmount__c, npo02__TotalOppAmount__c
salesforce_condition: Id in (SELECT AccountId FROM Opportunity WHERE RecordTypeId = '0123p000000EILEAA4')
salesforce_condition2: Id in (SELECT ConvertedAccountId FROM Lead WHERE Role__c ='Partner' AND CreatedDate >= 2024-07-01T00:00:00Z)
